description: This file defines the login screen widget for a Flutter application, including UI elements and state management for user authentication.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: Main widget class for the login screen, a ConsumerStatefulWidget that manages user input and triggers authentication.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State class for LoginScreen, handling the internal state like form key, user input, and UI updates.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the LoginScreen widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the UI for the login screen, including form fields, buttons, and error handling.
